title: Can not download League again
body:
Hey so I had to uninstall for reasons, but upon trying to reinstall i keep getting this DNS failure 

( The server at l3cdn.riotgames.com can't be found, because the DNS lookup failed. DNS is the network service that translates a website's name to its Internet address. This error is most often caused by having no connection to the Internet or a misconfigured network. It can also be caused by an unresponsive DNS server or a firewall preventing Google Chrome from accessing the network.
Go to http://riotgames.com/
Search on Google )

now I've tried deactivating my firewalls completely and retrying but still i get this failure, even after trying the riot games link i get this similar bs.
I've checked out most every thread on here and even the other regions ones for some sort of a fix but still nothing.

Im going to be at work for the next ten hours but i would love a resolution for when i get back! 
please help a fellow leaguer out.

p.s i am connected to the internet =_=

replies.body:
Argh issue resolved Thanks Mindstar! 
Ill delete this thread in a day {{summoner:7}}
Awesome to hear! If you don't mind saying, do you know which solution in particular worked for you?

Hey 

Can you actually access http://riotgames.com/ ?

It is quite possible you're facing the issue described in the sticky thread on this board - [RADS Error or unable to connect to support.riotgames.com](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom)

As a first step, I'd definitely check over those steps and try again.

Cheers
Mindstar
Hey just hoping i could get a response after the weekend :D

so i achieved this result from the cmd request 
ping request could not find host l3cdn.riotgames.com. please check the name and try again

is this information of any use to you?

hey thank you for your reply, unfortunately i cant access the riot page either 
im currently following the thread you posted will post results
